text: @MaddowBlog Letting #coronavirus continue to ruin all states, Trump CAN evoke presidential emergency power to rule that election result is invalid due to pandemic. Filing with SCOTUS will defer to House of Reps for one-per-state vote. Currently GOP out 'state' Dem. Trump stays in power.
